parameters.description: Set starting page of query, found in the response if all results does not fit in one page

get.description:
Get threshold breaches for a given device. A threshold breach is generated every time one of
the device sensors reports a value that crosses a predefined threshold value

200.description: List of sensors threshold breaches of the device

get.description: Get all locations

post.description: Add a new location to an organization

403.description: User does not have the correct role or is not a member of organization

409.description: A location with the same name or latitude and longitude already exist in this organization

get.description: Get info about a specific location
Get latest samples belonging to devices in a specific location (latest segment)

post.summary: Add a device to a location
post.description:
Add a new device to a location. The `serialNumber` and `id` can be found on the back of the device.
Note that the `id` in this context is not the `serialNumber`, as it can be when requesting resources
in other Airthings APIs. To use this endpoint, make sure your API client has the `write:device` scope
enabled in the dashboard and that the `write:device` scope is added to your access token
when requesting a token from the token endpoint.

400.description: The id(checkcode) provided for device was invalid or missing account selector params(`organizationId` or `userGroupId`)

get.description: Get all added webhooks

patch.description:
Edit a webhook in an organization. Only locations is supported at this time.
Value type of this endpoint is currently a list of location IDs that you wish to
perform the operation on.

get.description: Get all available organizations
Get threshold values for a device's sensors

airExchangeRate.description: values in air changes per hour (ACH)

airflow.description: values in cubic meters per hour (m³/h)

devices.description: list of devices in the location

data.description: latest sample data for the device

scopes.read:device: Allowing a user to read data from devices in their account
scopes.write:device: Allowing a user to manage devices within their account

scopes.read:device: Allowing a user to read data from devices in their account
scopes.write:device: Allowing a user to manage devices within their account
